             Reply reply)
      throws ClassicDatabaseException,
             ClassicNotFoundException
        Add a reply to the database.
        Parameters:

        void vote(int userID,
          int replyID,
          boolean up)
   throws ClassicUnauthorizedException,
          ClassicDatabaseException,
          ClassicNotFoundException
        Add a vote on a reply.
        Parameters:
        userID - Id the of the user that casts the vote.
        replyID - ID of the reply.
        up - boolean that indicates if the vote is an upvote (TRUE) or downvote (FALSE).
        Throws:
        ClassicUnauthorizedException
        ClassicDatabaseException
        ClassicNotFoundException
